attributes.action: Bring back Terracing to our football grounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Football is being priced out for the working class families, attendances are falling due to these prices. Bring back terracing at reduced cost to enable the working class to return to grounds and encourage the youngsters to attend more.  In turn this will also bring back the atmosphere missing at most grounds these days

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
